body: I want to either continue my walls series or my sg series. both of them would be on avicus. which one do you guys want to see more? ofc if sg is liked more i would have to wait till the winter update.
body_tagged: I want to either continue my walls series or my sg series. both of them would be on avicus. which one do you guys want to see more? ofc if sg is liked more i would have to wait till the winter update.
title: Walls or SG? (video series)

replies.body: I liked your Nebula series the best! However, for your options, I would like to see Walls more.
replies.body_tagged: I liked your Nebula series the best! However, for your options, I would like to see Walls more.

replies.body: Walls is better, the problem with SG IMO is that every match is similar. Guy finds good weapons, proceeds to destroy everyone, where as in walls, you can do whatever, want a skybase? Make one.
replies.body_tagged: Walls is better, the problem with SG IMO is that every match is similar. Guy finds good weapons, proceeds to destroy everyone, where as in walls, you can do whatever, want a skybase? Make one.
